workflow_runs.name: Publish Packages
workflow_runs.display_title: Publish Packages

head_commit.message:
ï¿½ Remove large ML files exceeding GitHub limits

- Removed champion-lora-adapter/ directory (contained 172MB+ files)
- Added large ML file patterns to .gitignore
- Prevents future upload of oversized model files

This ensures the repository stays within GitHub's file size limits
while maintaining all essential functionality.

repository.name: contextlite
repository.description: ContextLite is a Go-based context assembly engine that uses **Satisfiability Modulo Theories (SMT)** optimization to select the perfect set of documents for AI context windows. Built for speed, privacy, and local operation.

workflow_runs.name: CI
workflow_runs.display_title: Fix: Update Go version from 1.21 to 1.23 in GitHub Actions

head_commit.message:
Fix: Update Go version from 1.21 to 1.23 in GitHub Actions

- Workflow was using Go 1.21 but go.mod requires 1.23.0
- Added dependency download step to ensure clean resolution
- This fixes build-and-release job compilation error that was blocking 5+ package managers

Resolves: internal/api/middleware/rate_limiter.go:9:2: no required module provides package golang.org/x/time/rate
